attributes.action: Re Name Debdale Park to Choudhurys Children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Gias Uddin Choudhury is a very Famous and well respected Man in the area of Abbey Hey. He has held Countless events to raise Money for named Charitys. He Has Even obtained donations from many well known people such as Mike Tyson, Arthur Scargill, Trevor Wangsam, Aziz Raja, just to name a few. He is always trying to improve the area and he always has time for the young children who often look up to him. Now i feel it is time to give this wonderful man just a little back by re naming the Park.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
